1.1.description:
- Factions command
- Help command
- Info command

1.2.description:
- Made player names as hyperlinks in guild command
- More information in player command
- Ability to get a players game statistics by appending `?game` in player command

1.3.description:
- Made use of Discord timestamps
- Made use of NetherGames API Keys
- Servers command
- Removed More stats on player command
- Customizable Prefixes

1.4.description:
- Bug Fixes
- Guild tag color emojis
- Added commands cooldown system

1.5.description:
- Leaderboard command
- Slash commands
- Bot is now verified

1.6.description:
- Leaderboard now has buttons!
- Bug fixes

1.7.description: - Added online status in guild command

2.1.description:
- Ability to link players, guilds, and factions
- Bug Fixes and improvements
- Re added help command

2.2.description:
- Added context menus for Links
- And fixed a few crashes

2.5.description:
- Skin command
- Button "Game Leaderboard Stats" for Player command
- Added Levels & XP Info for Guilds command
- Bot has a winter profile picture
- Fixed embed thumbnails showing Steve
- "Show SKin" Button for Player command

2.6.description:
- Re added Factions command
- Custom Error messages for Status 404 & 503
- Changed global embed colors to #03bafc
- Link function for Skins command

2.7.description:
- Added a select menu to `ns!p` to filter stats
- Added buttons to gamemode stats embeds
- Synced gamemode stats embed colors
- Added a select menu to `ns!s` to filter servers
- Fixed Guild Tag showing `null`
- Fixed Guild Leader sometimes showing `null`

2.8.description:
- Fixed Player Game leaderboard filter showing "Player unspecified"
- Global Leaderboard command!
- Support for gamemode `Conquests` 
- End of support for gamemode `Races`, and `TNT Run`
- Removed Global Leaderboard `Deaths`
- Bug Fixes
- Improvements

2.9.description:
- Fixed Ping command
- Removed NGPing command 
- New Select menu for Global LEaderboard command to view stats from lb
- Added leaderboards `Factions Best Streak`, `Factions Streak` and `Factions Kills` to `ns!lb`
- New Command: `ns!v` used to show links of where to vote for bot and NG
- Prettyfied Server status for Player command
- Moved Log in-out dates to main embed
- Bug Fixes

3.0.description:
- Normal Bot avatar is back
- New commands: `ns!wp`, `ns!pgl`, `ns!pl`, `ns!wins`

- Error handling improvements
